      • DIRECTION_SWHE

        static final int DIRECTION_SWHE
        For these enum, it indicates the directions your function sampling from buffered image.

        S-----------W
        |           |
        |           |
        H-----------E

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • cast

        byte[] cast(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
            int modal_type)

        en： Bring a BufferedImage object to bytes. More detail please go and see sub-classes. Commonly this function will go thru getProperImage() and getByte().
        chn：将一个BufferedImage转化为byte[]对象， 具体实现见子类。通常情况下这个函数简化了使用，它会调用getProperImage()和getByte().

        参数:
        image - BufferedImage对象包含一个可转换图像。
        modal_type - An enum can figure out the procedures. Get this value by calling tag.getType()
        返回:
        经由图像转换出来的字节数组

      • getByte

        byte[] getByte(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
               int direction)
        en： Convert buffered image to byte array. Detail please see sub-classes. chn:可以让图片取模为像素点，具体实现见子类。
        参数:
        image - src
        direction - ENUM of ImageCaster figure out the directions.

        S-----------W
        |           |
        |           |
        H-----------E

        返回:
        byte[] pixels data.

      • getProperImage

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage getProperImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                            int modal_type)
        en: return a suitable image
        参数:
        image - src
        modal_type - tag's modal type
        返回:
        BufferedImage object, shrunks the image and redraw.
